title: Minister Attaf receives a phone call from his Iranian counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf, received Thursday a phone call from his Iranian counterpart, Hossein Amir-Abdollahian, who congratulated him on his appointment as head of the Algerian diplomacy. They also exchanged greetings on the occasion of the holy month of Ramadhan.

In this occasion, the two ministers reviewed the bilateral relations and the prospects for their strengthening, agreeing on the need to inject a new dynamic to the mechanisms of bilateral cooperation in the context of preparations for the upcoming events between the two countries.

Referring to regional and international issues of common interest, the two sides reiterated their solidarity with the Palestinian people and their unwavering support for its right to establish its independent state with El-Quds as its capital.

The two ministers reaffirmed, moreover, their commitment to the principles and objectives of the UN Charter and the Non-Aligned Movement but also to the role of multilateral diplomacy in the resolution of crises through peaceful solutions that can enable the international community to overcome polarization and avoid its negative consequences on international peace and security.
